author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: 𝚁𝚎𝚊𝚍𝚢 𝚝𝚘 𝚕𝚎𝚟𝚎𝚕 𝚞𝚙 𝚢𝚘𝚞𝚛 𝚐𝚊𝚖𝚎 𝚍𝚎𝚟𝚎𝚕𝚘𝚙𝚖𝚎𝚗𝚝 𝚜𝚔𝚒𝚕𝚕𝚜?   Join us in welcoming 𝗠𝗿. 𝗝𝗮𝗻𝘆𝗹 𝗧𝗮𝗻𝗼𝘆 — a 𝘴𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘥 𝘨𝘢𝘮𝘦 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘥𝘶𝘤𝘦𝘳, 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘶𝘯𝘪𝘵𝘺 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘦𝘳, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘢𝘷𝘪𝘥 𝘨𝘢𝘮𝘦𝘳 with expertise across multiple platforms. author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: _̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵ 𝙺𝚘𝚖𝚂𝚊𝚒𝚆𝚎𝚎𝚔𝟸0𝟸𝟹 𝙾𝚙𝚎𝚗𝚒𝚗𝚐𝙴𝚟𝚎𝚗𝚝 = 𝚗𝚎𝚠 𝙺𝚘𝚖𝚂𝚊𝚒𝚆𝚎𝚎𝚔𝟸0𝟸𝟹(); 𝚏𝚘𝚛 (𝚒𝚗𝚝 𝚒 = 0; 𝚒 < 𝟻; 𝚒++) {  𝙾𝚙𝚎𝚗𝚒𝚗𝚐𝙴𝚟𝚎𝚗𝚝.𝚂𝚝𝚊𝚛𝚝(); }… More _̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_̵_ 𝗚𝗲𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗹𝗼𝗼𝗽 𝗿𝗶𝗱𝗲! 🎢🌟 Here is what’s going to happen at our opening event, 𝗟𝗢𝗢𝗣 0️⃣: 𝗜𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗻 𝗔𝗹𝗴𝗼𝗿𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗔𝗱𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲! 🤩 And if you want to be a 𝙃𝙖𝙪𝙩𝙚 𝘾𝙤𝙙𝙚𝙧 😎, don't forget to wear your 𝙦𝙪𝙞𝙧𝙠𝙞𝙚𝙨𝙩 𝙩𝙚𝙘𝙝 𝙛𝙖𝙨𝙝𝙞𝙤𝙣 🕺 as you immerse yourself in this exciting event.  But that's not all! You can also have the chance to win some amazing prizes by joining our 𝗥𝗔𝗙𝗙𝗟𝗘 for ONLY 𝟱 𝗽𝗲𝘀𝗼𝘀. You could get your hands on some 𝙆𝙤𝙢𝙎𝙖𝙞 𝙈𝙚𝙧𝙘𝙝, 𝙒𝙤𝙧𝙠𝙨𝙥𝙖𝙘𝙚 𝙑𝙤𝙪𝙘𝙝𝙚𝙧𝙨, or even… More

author: UP Computer Science Guild

Komsai 2018 Runner-up. He also holds a degree in BS Computer Science from UP Cebu, where he honed his technical expertise and passion for innovation. With his extensive knowledge and experience in the field, he is the person to introduce us to the groundbreaking… More

author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: 𝓓𝓻𝓸𝓹, 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓺𝓾𝓮𝓼𝓽𝓲𝓸𝓷❓, 𝓭𝓻𝓸𝓹 𝓽𝓱𝓮, 𝓭𝓻𝓸𝓹 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓺𝓾𝓮𝓼𝓽𝓲𝓸𝓷❓ ~~ 𝓦𝓪𝓷𝓽 𝓪𝓽𝓽𝓮𝓷𝓽𝓲𝓸𝓷🥺, 𝔀𝓪𝓷𝓽, 𝔀𝓪𝓷𝓽 𝓪𝓽𝓽𝓮𝓷𝓽𝓲𝓸𝓷🥺 ~~ We're glad that we have your attention now🙌, as we're ready to answer your question regarding the roles of each… More member in "Buta, Bungol, Amang".🤗 🅱🆄🆃🅰 (blind) 🙈 : types the code while wearing a blindfold and relies on Bungol's instructions. 🅱🆄🅽🅶🅾🅻 (deaf) 🙉 : assists Buta in typing the code to solve the problem communicated by the Amang. 🅰🅼🅰🅽🅶 (mute) 🙊 : responsible for communicating the code to Bungol. Showing the problem, speaking, writing, and using props are strictly prohibited. However, sign language is allowed for communication. We put a whole new spin🤸‍♀️ on the classic programming… More

author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: ᴿᵉᵃᵈʸ ᵗᵒ ᵍᵉᵉᵏ ᵒᵘᵗ?🤓 ᴷᵒᵐˢᵃⁱ ᵂᵉᵉᵏ ⁱˢ ʲᵘˢᵗ ᵃʳᵒᵘⁿᵈ ᵗʰᵉ ᶜᵒʳⁿᵉʳ! ᴶᵒⁱⁿ ᵘˢ ᶠᵒʳ ᵃ ʷᵉᵉᵏ ᵒᶠ ˡᵉᵃʳⁿⁱⁿᵍ ᵃⁿᵈ ᵈⁱˢᶜᵒᵛᵉʳʸ. 📚✨ Let us 𝙗𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙠 𝙖𝙬𝙖𝙮 from traditional coding patterns by stumbling upon a 𝙣𝙚𝙬 𝙥𝙡𝙖𝙣𝙚𝙩 in the expansive… More field of k໐๓Şคi. Let's boldly go where no coder has gone before!🚀💻 And since we've got some 𝙞𝙣𝙘𝙧𝙚𝙙𝙞𝙗𝙡𝙚 𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙨💥 in the works for you guys, better 𝙨𝙩𝙖𝙮 𝙩𝙪𝙣𝙚𝙙 for more details!(⁠≧⁠▽⁠≦⁠) Join Komsai dp blast and follow this link to get started: 🔗 https://twb.nz/komsaiweek-2023 Follow us on our new social media pages! 📷 Instagram: 🔗 https://instagram.com/upcsg?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y= 🗃️ LinkedIn: UP Computer Science Guild 🔗 https://www.linkedin.com/company/university-of-the-philippines-computer-science-guild-upcsg/ #BreakingLoopsReturningLegacies #KomsaiWeek2023

author: UPC Maroon Esports
text: 💥𝐎𝐍𝐄 𝐖𝐄𝐄𝐊 𝐋𝐄𝐅𝐓! 𝐑𝐄𝐆𝐈𝐒𝐓𝐑𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐋𝐎𝐒𝐄𝐃!💥 These are the total number of participants for the Komsai Esports Tournament: 𝐌𝐨𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐋𝐞𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐬: 𝐁𝐚𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐚𝐧𝐠: 8 Teams 𝐓𝐞𝐤𝐤𝐞𝐧 𝟕: 16 Players Tournament bracketing to be… More revealed this Friday!✊ May the odds be in your favor as we 𝘌𝘹𝘦𝘤𝘶𝘵𝘦, 𝘐𝘯𝘴𝘱𝘪𝘳𝘦, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘙𝘦𝘷𝘪𝘵𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘦 Campus Esports this KomSai Week! 📖🎮 In partnership with UP Computer Science Guild and AcadArena.🤝 #UPCSGxUPCME  #AcadArena #execute #inspire #revitalize #esports #MLBB  #NotJustPlay #KomSaiWeek2023 #BreakingLoopsReturningLegacies

author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: ᴏɴᴄᴇ ᴀɢᴀɪɴ 一 ʀᴇᴀᴅʏ, ꜱᴇᴛ, ᴄɪʀᴄᴜɪᴛ! 🏁 Our robot racers are 𝙧𝙚𝙫𝙫𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙪𝙥 their 𝙚𝙣𝙜𝙞𝙣𝙚𝙨 for the ultimate b͓̽a͓̽t͓̽t͓̽l͓̽e͓̽ ͓̽o͓̽f͓̽ ͓̽t͓̽h͓̽e͓̽ ͓̽b͓̽o͓̽t͓̽s͓̽. 🅱uckle up and prepare for an 𝘢𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘯𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘦-𝘧𝘶𝘦𝘭𝘦𝘥 𝘳𝘪𝘥𝘦… More like no other!✨Will your favorite bot🤖 cross the finish line first?🥇 Better come to find out!🫣 The 𝙍𝙤𝙗𝙤𝙍𝙖𝙘𝙚𝙧𝙨 𝙏𝙤𝙪𝙧𝙣𝙖𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩 is set to blow your mind🤯 with its cutting-edge 𝘵𝘦𝘤𝘩𝘯𝘰𝘭𝘰𝘨𝘺 and mind-boggling 𝘴𝘱𝘦𝘦𝘥.🏎️ ⚡ ‼️Coming this March 2023‼️ #RacingRobotsRock #RoboRacersTournament #KomsaiWeek2023 #BreakingLoopsReturningLegacies

author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: 💗『S』『T』『O』『R』『Y』 『T』『I』『M』『E』 💗 When we were planning our event comeback, we knew we needed a venue that could handle the planning and prepping stages of our large team for 14 action-packed events. That's when … MoreThe Company CEBU came in! Their spacious and ergonomic venue was the perfect fit for our needs. It was conducive to productivity, which made our meeting a breeze. We even had the luxury of breakout sessions for all of our projects, which allowed us to work efficiently and collaboratively. Our team has been working tirelessly to prepare for the upcoming KomSai Week 2023 and we're excited to finally launch the event this 𝘔𝘢𝘳𝘤𝘩 27 𝘢𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘜𝘯𝘪𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘺 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘗𝘩𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘱𝘱𝘪𝘯𝘦𝘴 𝘊𝘦𝘣𝘶 and give… More

author: Raine Laluna
text: Happy to announce Web3 Cebu is participating in the upcoming UP Cebu Computer Science event and will be speaking about Web3 and the opportunities of this tech to the ComSci students of UP Cebu. One of the… More highlights of the event will be the exhibit of "PROJECT CEBOOM," an interactive web-based program that aims to provide users with the shortest possible route within Cebu island.  Exciting events coming in Cebu! And looking forward to sharing Web3 with more Universities in Cebu. LFG 🚀 #Web3Cebu

author: UP Computer Science Guild
text: 𝙃𝙚𝙩𝙤 𝙉𝙖, 𝙃𝙚𝙩𝙤 𝙉𝘼, 𝙃𝙀𝙏𝙊 𝙉𝘼𝘼𝘼, 𝘼𝘼𝘼𝘼𝘼𝘼!!! 😱📈 Get ready to experience our most exhilarating event of the year ‼️ 𝐊𝐨𝐦𝐒𝐚𝐢 𝐖𝐞𝐞𝐤 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟑 ‼️ Our officers, project leads, and volunteers have poured their hearts and souls… More into preparing for this 🏅 𝖑𝖊𝖌𝖊𝖓𝖉𝖆𝖗𝖞 🏅 event from 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝟮𝟳-𝟯𝟭 𝗮𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗨𝗻𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗣𝗵𝗶𝗹𝗶𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀 𝗖𝗲𝗯𝘂. We reconvened at The Company CEBU for the planning and preparations, and we couldn't have done it without their generous support! 🥰💞 From workshops to competitions, and everything in between, we've got an action-packed schedule that'll keep you on the edge of your seat 😉✨ Trust us, 𝘺𝘰𝘶 𝘸𝘰𝘯'𝘵 𝘸𝘢𝘯𝘵 𝘵𝘰 𝘮𝘪𝘴𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘴! 👾💚 #TheCompanyCebu #KomSaiWeek2023 #BreakingLoopsReturningLegacies
